      • copy

        public BDD copy​(BDD copy,
                int offset,
                int start,
                int stop)
        Create a copy of the given BDD from layer start to stop onto the given BDD. Add the copy of the nodes to the given BDD at the same layer + the given offset. Example : start = 1, stop = 3, offset = 2 will copy the layer 1 onto the layer 3 of the copy BDD, layer 2 on layer 4 and layer 3 on layer 5.
        Parameters:
        copy - The BDD used to stock the copy
        offset - The offset of the copy
        start - The first layer to copy
        stop - The last layer to copy
        Returns:
        A copy of the current BDD from layer start to layer stop.

      • copy

        public BDD copy​(BDD copy,
                BinaryNode root,
                int offset)
        Create a copy of the given BDD from root to tt onto the given BDD. Add the copy of the nodes to the given BDD at the same layer + the given offset.
        Parameters:
        copy - The BDD used to stock the copy
        root - The root node of the BDD
        offset - The offset of the copy
        Returns:
        A copy of the current BDD from root to tt

      • addArc

        public void addArc​(BinaryNode source,
                   int value,
                   BinaryNode destination,
                   int layer)
        Add an arc between the source node and the destination node with the given value as label. Ensures the connection between the two nodes
        Parameters:
        source - The source node (parent)
        value - The value of the arc's label
        destination - The destination node (child)
        layer - The layer of the PARENT node (source)

      • removeArc

        public void removeArc​(BinaryNode source,
                      int value)
        Remove the arc from the source node with the given label's value. Ensures to delete references of this arc in both nodes.
        Parameters:
        source - The source node
        value - The value of the arc's label.

      • addArcAndNode

        public void addArcAndNode​(BinaryNode source,
                          int value,
                          BinaryNode destination,
                          int layer)
        Add the node destination to the given layer, and add an arc between the source node and the destination node with the given value as label.
        Parameters:
        source - The source node
        value - The value of the arc's label
        destination - The destination node - node to add in the BDD
        layer - The layer of the BDD where the node destination will be added

      • reduce

        Transform the DD into a normal form (delete useless nodes, merge leaves, reduce).

      • setTT

        public void setTT()
        Automatically set the terminal node.
        Specified by:
        setTT in class DecisionDiagram

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear the DD without freeing it. That is, remove and free all nodes from the layers, clear the domains and set the tt's pointer to null. The layers are kept.
        Specified by:
        clear in class DecisionDiagram
